overview: Whistle ....Hodi Magaa is an Indian Kannada film directed by Prashant Raj of Love Guru Fame. The story begins on a romantic note with Ram, a pizza delivery boy who marries his girlfriend Anu after she gets pregnant. The story takes a curious turn when Ram, who visits Smitha Bungalow to deliver pizza. The drama that follows in the haunted house is linked to diamonds. Itâ€™s a remake of Tamil blockbuster 'Pizza'.
title: Whistle
